Mod.Name: Porn Empire [Ready for Remake]
Mod.Description: Run your own porn company in LifePlay. PornEmpire is a LifePlay mod that lets you run your own porn business in LifePlay. Its a management sim, so expect it to be challenging. Manage models, create videos to sell them online, organize cam shows and castings. The mod has many custom 3D scenes, NPC creator with body morphs and 30 model presets.
Mod.Msg: Thanks for installing PornEmpire! If you find any bugs, please report on F95 or Discord. Thanks. - NickNo

Mod.Name: NPC Manager [Ready for Remake]
Mod.Description: Manage NPCs, Relatives, Relationships etc. Use with care! Manage NPC-NPC or NPC-Player relationships This little tool can help you to - Set relationships between NPCs, relatives and/or the player (MC) - Find 'lost' NPCs and add them to your contacts - Delete all NPCs not in your contacts (To increase game performance) - Delete ALL NPCs (even your contacts) - Delete ALL Relatives

Mod.Name: Home Extensions
Mod.Description: Add more rooms and life to your home. This adds six 3D rooms to any Home - it also adds new scenes/locations for the bathroom. Tow additional bedrooms can be let to other contacts / random NPCs. The two optional bedrooms can be rent to NPCs. If you do so, you will have some more life in your home and... maybe some interesting encounters :)

Mod.Name: Gangs of LifePlay: Kingpin [Ready for Remake]
Mod.Description: You are the boss. The crime boss! This WIP mod adds turn based combat to LifePlay. The battle system is already working and you have different weapons to choose from. You can break into storage rooms of hostpitals, pharmacies etc and sell drugs and items to make money. The mod extends the crime options that the base game has. If offers turn based combat for (currently one) opponent(s) and will allow gang and prostitution management.

Mod.Name: Home Extensions [Remake Only]
Mod.Description: Add more rooms and life to your home. This adds six 3D rooms to any Home - it also adds new scenes/locations for the bathroom. Tow additional bedrooms can be let to other contacts / random NPCs. The two optional bedrooms can be rent to NPCs. If you do so, you will have some more life in your home and... maybe some interesting encounters :) Mod only compatible with the Remake!

Mod.Name: Mysterious Modder's Additional Modules [Remake Only]
Mod.Description: My additional Modules. If you know me, you know what it's all about! Don't activate this mod! Delete or backup existing Remake LifePlay folders, and replace them with mine. Use LewdPatcher for LifePlay vanilla version.
Mod.Msg: Don't activate this mod! Delete or backup existing Remake LifePlay folders, and replace them with mine. Use LewdPatcher for LifePlay

Mod.Name: Additional activities Module
Mod.Description: Add additional scenes during all type of activities A mod created by r8kie and abandoned, which I decided to revive for those who like his mod. Adds extra scenes during certain types of activities The mod contain no lpaction files, only lpscenes. The mod offer 18 new scenes about board games, mysterious events and more

Mod.Name: Art Shop addon Module
Mod.Description: This mod offers you the possibility to buy works of art in certain stores in your city. You can sell and trade art items at some places around the city. 8 types of art items to buy. Contain 1 scene, at the moment. You can buy them at these stores: art, marketplace, gift

Mod.Name: Bakery Shop Module
Mod.Description: Add options to buy/eat pastry and bread! This mod offers you the possibility to buy/eat bakery products of quality in certain stores in your city. 8 types of bakery products. Apply to a job at an erotic bakery shop... You can buy bakery products at these stores: bakery, greengrocer, marketplace, supermarket, variety_store

Mod.Name: Bank Module
Mod.Description: Add options to deposit and withdraw money! This mod allows you to accumulate more money to do your foolishness or just to enjoy yourself. It gives you the option to borrow money from the bank.

Mod.Name: Cigars Shop Module
Mod.Description: Add options to buy and for smoking Cigars at different places around the city. 5 brands of the best cigars. Contain only 2 scenes.

Mod.Name: Computer Shop Module
Mod.Description: Add options to buy a computer at some stores around the city. 4 types of computer to buy. Contain 1 scene, at the moment.

Mod.Name: Confectionery Shop Module
Mod.Description: Add options to buy/eat candies at different places around the city. 8 types of candy. Contain 3 scenes.

Mod.Name: Erotic Shop Module
Mod.Description: Add options to buy erotic products at different places around the city. 7 types of erotic product, 4 variety for each types. 1 adult toy box. You can play with most of the toys. At the moment, you cannot use all of them separately... next updates, if Vin add animations for it.

Mod.Name: Exclusive Swinger Club Module
Mod.Description: Take a membership to an exclusive swingers club related to your ethnicity! Subscribe to the club Unsubscribe to the club Threesome, foursome, cuckold and more to come.

Mod.Name: God Mod Module [Ready for Remake]
Mod.Description: Cheat all the way inside LifePlay! The mod for cheating in LifePlay! You need money faster, more skills, more items,....that's the mod you need! Some options/stats from the game itself cannot be changed as this may create bugs or messed up your saves. Some mods already have a cheating section, in that case, this mod will send you to these sections. This mod will always expand by time. If a new LifePlay mod appears, I will try to include is items/options.

Mod.Name: Home Inventories Module
Mod.Description: Better way to store your items - Focused on my mods items! Attempt to reduce the number of items in the action menu. It allows you to have your items classified by categories. Some inventories become active only if the Home Extensions mod is activated.

Mod.Name: Ice Cream Shop Module
Mod.Description: This mod gives you the possibility to buy frozen desserts in different stores. There are 5 types of frozen treats to choose from. Once you have purchased a dessert, it will automatically be added to your inventory. Then you can enjoy them at home. Some shops and others, offer you the possibility to eat on site. Contain 3 files.

Mod.Name: Jewellery Shop Module
Mod.Description: Buy,trade or sell jewellery and few extras ! Add options to buy, sell and trade jewelry at some places around the city. 8 types of jewelry to buy. Contain 2 scenes.

Mod.Name: Backgrounds Collection
Mod.Description: 28 different background presets Different backgrounds created to use with my mods and also for people who wants to use it for modding the game LifePlay. Installs in the same way as a mod.

Mod.Name: Meat Shop Module
Mod.Description: Add options to buy/eat meaty meals at different places around the city. 8 types of meals with meat. Each dish you eat will increase or decrease your stats. Contain 3 scenes.

Mod.Name: Mobile Shop Module
Mod.Description: Add options to buy a phone at some stores around the city. 4 types of phone to buy. Contain 1 scene, at the moment.

Mod.Name: Money Maker Module
Mod.Description: 3 mods that I made to make money, in one package. Add the possibility to deposit and withdraw money at the bank. You can buy/sell/trade jewelry, separately. You can buy/sell/trade arts. 8 types of jewelry 8 types of arts.

Mod.Name: More Rides Module
Mod.Description: Add the possibility to buy/sell/trade a motorcycle separately. Add the possibility to buy/sell/trade a bicycle separately. Add the possibility to buy/sell/trade a car. 8 motorcycle brands. 8 bicycle brands. 7 car brands. Also can buy with sex if your lucky.

Mod.Name: More Interactions in Prison Module
Mod.Description: Add more fun interactions in your prison cell! This mod adds extra scenes and actions that will make you less bored while waiting to be released. If you don't like non-consensual content, it's not a mod for you!
Mod.Msg: The mods rk_Home_Inventories and rk_Personal_Inventories are needed

Mod.Name: More personal Interactions Module
Mod.Description: Adds actions and scenes related to your daily life! You will able to buy and takes viagra Have a sensual massage Train your dog And more to come... Contain 9 new scenes Contain 2 new stats Contain 12 new actions
Mod.Msg: The mods rk_Home_Inventories and rk_Personal_Inventories are needed

Mod.Name: More Interactions Events Module
Mod.Description: Add more popup scenes variety to your game! This mod adds more NTR scenes in particular. 15 different events that can occur depending on your location or action. If you don't like NTR content, it's not a mod for you!
Mod.Msg: The mods rk_Home_Inventories and rk_Personal_Inventories are needed

Mod.Name: Love Interactions Module
Mod.Description: Add more actions and consequences to your love relationship. Parties, all kinds of serious and wacky proposals, love, cheating, and much more to come! Contain 22 scenes Contain 25 actions
Mod.Msg: The mods rk_Home_Inventories and rk_Personal_Inventories are needed

Mod.Name: Badass Interactions Module
Mod.Description: Add more badass and naughty actions to your game! Add options to do silly things around the city. Groping, offer from stranger, kiss companion,... If you don't like NTR content, it's not a mod for you!
Mod.Msg: The mods rk_Home_Inventories and rk_Personal_Inventories are needed

Mod.Name: My Neighbours Module [Ready for Remake]
Mod.Description: New stories with your neighbours! Add new interactions with your neighbours. Contain 4 stories. Contain 10 scenes. Story about a naked gardener Story about a new neighbour who need help for moving in. Story about a neighbour who needs attention. And more... This mod will expand by time and also by suggestion made.

Mod.Name: Online Food shop Module [Ready for Remake]
Mod.Description: Buy drinks and meals online - Focused on foods from and for my mods! Adds an action to be able to do your grocery shopping online, instead of going directly to the store to buy your food. Prices are a little different online than in stores.

Mod.Name: Personal Inventories Module
Mod.Description: Better way to store your personal items - Focused on my mods items! This mod adds 2 new pockets and wallet inventories. It allows you to better manage your items and also to reduce the number of items in the action menu.

Mod.Name: Pop corns Shop Module
Mod.Description: Add options to buy/eat popcorns at different places around the city. 4 popcorns to choose. Contain 4 scenes.

Mod.Name: Random Breakups Module
Mod.Description: Add and modify some events so that breakups happen without you - and actually frees the person - or you can be more proactive into causing them. A mod created by VinnyB and abandoned, which I decided to revive for those who like his mod. I took the care to correct the code and some typos.

Mod.Name: Seafood Shop Module
Mod.Description: Add options to buy/eat seafood at different places around the city. 5 seafood meals to choose. Each meals gives you some bonus. Contain 4 scenes.

Mod.Name: Sex-Guru Module [Ready for Remake]
Mod.Description: Start your own religious community! Start you own guru life by hiring disciple and earning money by selling special products. This mod contain 52 scenes, 46 new characters and some events.

Mod.Name: Shop Addons Module
Mod.Description: All the mods I made for shopping / eating in the city, in one. Add more options to buy / eat different consumable items in the city. Contain 5 types of inventory (adult toy box, freezer, pantry, pockets and refrigerator) Contain 34 scenes. Contain 1 scenes locked until you get black market skills. This mod contains all my mini-shops/mods

Mod.Name: Vape Shop Module
Mod.Description: Add options to buy/smoke vape juices at different places around the city. 5 flavors to choose. Contain 2 scenes.

Mod.Name: Vegan Shop Module
Mod.Description: Add options to buy/eat vegan meals at different places around the city. 8 vegan meals to choose. Each meals gives you different stats bonus. Contain 7 scenes.

Mod.Name: LifePlay Fantasy Module [Remake Only]
Mod.Description: LifePlay fantasy folder turn into a mod for the Remake. This mod adds several scenes and actions to the game. You can buy blood You can drink blood You got a blood stash

Mod.Name: Weed Business Module [Ready for Remake]
Mod.Description: Start your own weed business, make more money! Start your own business as a dealer. Contain 28 scenes. You can hire employees to help you sell and protect your bunker. A tutorial (wip) and cheats are included.

Mod.Name: Weed Shop Module
Mod.Description: Add options to buy/smoke weed at different places around the city. 8 flavors to choose from. Contain 2 scenes. Contain 1 scenes locked until you get black market skills.

Mod.Name: Body Weight - Fitness Module
Mod.Description: Adds weight gain and loss for player - NPCs. A mod created by SexyBastardo and abandoned, that I decided to revive for those who like his mod. Adds weight gain and loss for player and NPCs Adds weight gain and loss for player and NPCs A mod that adds statistics to your and your dear's weight. Depending on what you do, eat or drink, your weight will either decrease or increase.

Mod.Name: Beauty Expansion Module [Ready for Remake]
Mod.Description: A beauty additions for your companion. Rework of the mod Beauty Expansion. Beauty Additions for your companion With this mod you will be able to offer to your dear one: - A new haircut - A new hair dye - Beauty treatment - Fake nails - Fake eyelashes - and more...

Mod.Name: Tinder style module
Mod.Description: Tinder style dynamic dating

Mod.Name: Vima's Bedroom Presets
Mod.Description: 10 bed room presets for you

Mod.Name: Yarla's Character Pack
Mod.Description: 20 male and female character presets

Mod.Name: Yarla's Character Pack 2
Mod.Description: 28 male and female character presets

Mod.Name: N1ck's Character presets
Mod.Description: 13 male and female characters and 44 presets

Mod.Name: Dresser module
Mod.Description: Allows you to dress NPCs in clothes you select

Mod.Name: Home Assignment module
Mod.Description: Adds an Assign Home action to the PC menu which allows you to assign homes to NPCs

Mod.Name: Re-Dresser module
Mod.Description: A utility mod that allows you to force companions to change their clothes by clicking on them and selecting Re-dress in the interaction menu.
